name: The Gates
description:
You have to find batteries and deliver them to power generator, which opens the gates to the next level. Batteries can be foun on a level or recycled from resources which also can be found on level. 
Main task of this game is keep generator working until it open the gates.

Controls:
E - interaction;
Esc - pause menu;
LShift - sprint;

Ofcourse it's unfinished game but LD46 is my first jam and this game is my first experince too, is was very fun and challenging process and I enjoed it!

BugFix:

Fixed portals;

Decreased win timer so now you can finish game;
